title: Strangeness and Charm
description: The Courts of the Feyre, Vol IIIAlex has been saved from the fate that awaited her in Bedlam, but in freeing her, Niall has released others of their kind into the population. Now, as Warder, he must find them and persuade them to swap their new-found liberty for security in the courts â€“ but is the price of sanctuary to swap one cage for another?
author: Mike Shevdon
